body:
Hello Mark,


Many wonderful points of inspirations  - thanks for sharing.


Question - page 11 RGB Estimate:
1) Why are you normalising to 0.9 rather than full scale of 1?
2) Why are you squaring the result?


*Terrance Mc Minn
